resources.string: Techsys Informatics is a Global Technology Services company established in Sept 2013 located in Pune, with capabilities to deliver software services to clients globally. Our customers are of all sizes ranging from start-up to large enterprises who realize that they need professional technology, training and staffing solutions to generate revenue streams, establish communication channels or streamline business operations.
To assist companies and individuals in making key business decisions, support Business Process Management (BPM).
To be a leading consulting firm that ensures client’s business sustainability; growth and empowering each individual’s intellect towards highest commercial productivity.

The company provides services like
Web Design and development
Software Development
Digital Marketing
Graphics Design
